item.title: My First ScreenSaver - an obsession in VB6
item.description: So back when I first started writing code, I was had this obsession with screen savers. I don’t really know why but I loved screen savers that were not repetitive, ones that changed over time and did something. Like any of the following: Johnny Castaway by Sierra Online - best writeup, wikipedia the After Dark series by Berkeley Systems - wikipedia SETI@home World Community Grid Various Santa Clause antic’s screen savers Various Fish Tank screen savers …and my personal favorite:
